name: CreateAzureCostManagementAccount
description:
Create a Cloud Cost Management account for Azure.

Use this tool to set up a Cloud Cost Management account for an Azure configuration using Datadog.

parameters.name: azure_config_post_data
parameters.description: JSON object containing Azure account details including account_id, client_id, scope, and bill configurations.

account_id.description: The tenant ID of the Azure account.

export_name.description: The name of the configured Azure Export.

export_path.description: The path where the Azure Export is saved.

storage_account.description: The name of the storage account where the Azure Export is saved.

storage_container.description: The name of the storage container where the Azure Export is saved.

export_name.description: The name of the configured Azure Export.

export_path.description: The path where the Azure Export is saved.

storage_account.description: The name of the storage account where the Azure Export is saved.

storage_container.description: The name of the storage container where the Azure Export is saved.

client_id.description: The client ID of the Azure account.

scope.description: The scope of your observed subscription.

attributes.description: Attributes for Azure config Post Request.

type.description: Type of Azure config Post Request.
